boardgame.description: In Pylos, you want to be one who places the final ball on top of the pyramid. Sounds simple enough, right?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of the game, each player has fifteen balls, either light or dark, and they take turns placing them on a game board that has sixteen indentations on it in a 4x4 grid. Once four balls have been placed next to one another in a square, a ball can be placed on top of them, forming a second level of play. Players can then place balls on this second level, eventually allowing a ball to be placed on the third level _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and once that level is full, which requires only four balls, a final ball can be placed on the fourth level, with that player winning the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If a player forms a square of his own color _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; that is, four balls placed next to one another on the same level _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; that player can remove one or two of his balls (that don't support anything) from anywhere on the board and place them in his reserve, thereby giving him more balls to place in the future. Whenever a player forms a square that's not entirely his own color, he can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;stack_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; one of his pieces _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; that is, he can take any ball and place it on this square, locking some pieces in place and making a move without having to place a piece from his reserve._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The rules include a variant for children (that removes the square bonus) and one for experts (that allows a player to return 1-2 balls to his reserve when he creates a line of his color)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Strat-O-Sphere_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. GST _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;/or PST are applicable on all orders depending on your location. Shipping will depend on your location. I will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. Please email me with any questions. Thanks Jason Schill JJSUPERSTORE jason@fadzone.com
Pylos by Gigamic. Complete. Box has wear. One of the balls has had the finish worn off (it may be a replacement). See the picture - it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the one at the top of the pyramid.

Beautiful 1994 Wooden Pyraos version by Gigamic makes a nice table top game. The game has received awards from Mensa, Games Magazine, and Gioco dell_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Anno, Italia. Contents are still in the original packaging, complete and undamaged. Instructions are on the back of the box, but also copied instructions and included in the box. The box has a big ding _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; dent, tape residue, and shelf wear.
Pylos Travel Edition by Gigamic. Box and board have some wear but overall in good shape. Buyer only pays actual shipping. Send me your postal code for an estimate. Combined shipping available. Thanks

Pylos (1994) by Gigamic Box: Light shelfwear with a few dings, dents, and creases. There are also several areas of clear tape (which was used to hold the box flaps closed). Overall the box is in very good+ condition! Components: Complete and in like new condition! Pieces have been sorted and stored in plastic bags for convenience and protection - you will be very pleased with how the game has been packaged. SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 3 Lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.
Gigamic 1994 edition titled Pyraos. Out of shrink but pieces still in bags. Plastic board and offwhite/green pieces in like new condition. Slight shelf wear to box. Buyer pays shipping from Canada.
